name: Essence of a Gentleman
description:
A narrative point-and-click about our favorite queer pirates. Ed wants to become a true gentleman and Stede is obviously gonna help... but will he resist his own demons?

To play, hover all around the screen until you find something to click on.

Concept & text by Eshmiel & Tellington

Graphisms by Eshmiel

Music and sounds by Notna

Programmed by Tellington

This game was made for the Our Jam Means Death #1. We didn't have time to finish the graphisms before the end of the jam so the wardrobe and kitchen scene backgrounds were made with Hotpot. We hope to change that quickly.
